name: Dan Leslie
description: I guess I would classify myself as caring, loving, giving and just all around happy with life. I believe in being positive and creating your own luck in life. I am not an angry person nor do I hold grudges. Life is too short to worry about the small things. I am very forgiving. I do not get upset easily, and I am very patient. I am also a passionate person. I am passionate in love and in life. Chemistry is very important. I also am a very trustworthy person. I believe in the sanctity of marriage
